Martı'nın yeni sürümünde neler var?
- Rezervasyon deneyimini iyileştirdik. Martı’nı başkası kapmasın istiyorsanı hemen rezerve etmeyi deneyebilirsin.
- Martı’nın keyfini sürmen için yaptığımız kampanyaları Kampanyalar içerisinden görebilirsin. Hem de indirim kuponlarını da Kampanyalar içinde bulabilirsin.
- Sürüş sonunda bazı cihazlarda yaşanan sorunları artık yaşamayacaksın.
- Başka hangi şehirlerde Martı’layabilirim diye merak ediyorsan seni de mutlu edecek bir sürprizimiz var.
Tüm bu yeni özellikler bu sürümde keşfetmeni bekliyor!
Sizlerden gelen geri bildirimlerle Martı’yı en iyi hizmeti sunacak şekilde geliştirmeye devam ediyoruz. Bizimle yorumlarınızı paylaşmayı unutmayın!
Sizden gelen geri bildirimler doğrultusunda Martı deneyiminizi iyileştirmeye devam ediyoruz. Hemen güncelleyip şehrin keyfini sürmeye başlayın!
Sizden gelen geri bildirimler doğrultusunda Martı deneyiminizi iyileştirmeye devam ediyoruz. Hemen güncelleyip şehrin keyfini sürmeye başlayın!

What’s new?
- We’ve added ID verification for a safer ride experience. You only need to verify your information once.
- Security tab is added under the menu to help you learn more about MARTI’s security.
- Improvements to the user experience.
- Solved a problem with ending the ride, you will no longer have location-related problems.
We are working hard to offer you the best experience possible at MARTI. Don’t forget to continue sharing your feedback!

What’s new?
- We’ve added ID verification for a safer ride experience. You only need to verify your information once.
- Security tab is added under the menu to help you learn more about MARTI’s security.
- Improvements to the user experience.
- Solved a problem with ending the ride, you will no longer have location-related problems.
We are working hard to offer you the best experience possible at MARTI. Don’t forget to continue sharing your feedback!

What’s new?
- Now you can invite your friend and get a discount for the next ride!
- You can now see past rides in more detail. Moreover, you can view the invoice for your ride from the ride detail screen.
- We made performance improvements in line with the feedback we received from you.

We are working hard to offer you the best experience possible at MARTI. Don’t forget to continue sharing your feedback!

- We made performance improvements in line with the feedback we received from you.

We are working hard to offer you the best experience possible at MARTI. Don’t forget to continue sharing your feedback!

What’s new?
- Now you can invite your friend and get a discount for the next ride!
- You can now see past rides in more detail. Moreover, you can view the invoice for your ride from the ride detail screen.
- We made performance improvements in line with the feedback we received from you.

We are working hard to offer you the best experience possible at MARTI. Don’t forget to continue sharing your feedback!

What’s new?
- We defined a low-speed zone in certain areas for your safety. After starting your ride, Martı will slow down in the low-speed zone that appears in yellow on the map and will return to the normal speed limit when you leave the low-speed zone.
- We made developments for you to navigate the map more comfortably.
- We made performance improvements in line with the feedback we received from you.
We are working hard to offer you the best experience possible at MARTI. Don’t forget to continue sharing your feedback!

What’s new?
- We defined a low-speed zone in certain areas for your safety. After starting your ride, Martı will slow down in the low-speed zone that appears in yellow on the map and will return to the normal speed limit when you leave the low-speed zone.
- We made developments for you to navigate the map more comfortably.
- We made performance improvements in line with the feedback we received from you.
We are working hard to offer you the best experience possible at MARTI. Don’t forget to continue sharing your feedback!

What’s new?
- Earn a discount at your ride destination! According to your starting location, you can see blue areas on the map. You can get a discount by ending your ride in blue areas.
- You can see No Riding Zones on the map as grey areas. Martı will not move in these zones for your safety.
- We made performance improvements in line with the feedback we received from you.
Don’t forget to continue sharing your feedback!

We are introducing Martı Wallet!
You can now deposit Martı Wallet with your credit cards and earn free credits for your deposits. Martı Wallet is a fast and secure way to pay for your reservations and rides.

We made improvements at Coupons for your experience.

We made improvements to fix the problems for your experience while ending the ride.

We are working hard to offer you the best experience possible at MARTI. Continue to share your feedback!

You can see discounted Martı scooters on the map which is special for you. You can get a discount by starting your ride with discounted Martı.
We made improvements to the user experience of Martı Wallet.
We made bug fixes and performance improvements in line with the feedback we received from you.

We are working hard to offer you the best experience possible at MARTI. Don’t forget to continue sharing your feedback!

Follow @martiturkiye on Instagram and you can earn! You can reach the details from campaigns.
